body_text:
current things

Oct 2025 - Plug It Up Plug It Up is a DIY sound art festival combining workshops and performances led by female & marginalised gender artists who are working with sound in innovative ways. Really chuffed to have been a part of this ambitious event, the first of its kind in Bradford and by such a tiny team.

July 2025 - Imagine Zine Space We, Loosely Bound zine collective, took over Trapezium Arts space for two days to make zines together during International Zine Month, thanks to some funding by Creative Lives. We feel lucky to have had this opportunity and think all spaces should do this for their community!

Apr 2025 - Issue 12 The Magpie is Bradford's Radical News Sheet that i edit and aim to publish twice a year. Issue 12 was launched at the Lister Art Trail.

By the time you read this, new issues would have been made :)

Nov 2024 - Apr 2025 Dead Painters SÃ©ance exploration in AI generative text to connect a modern audience to underrepresented people and groups of people in art (play here) (press) Photos by Eva-Maria Bongardt

Oct - Nov 2024 LAGUMADU sound installation calling attention to defaunation at Trapezium Arts (listen here)

ongoing things

Gilank is a duo of Bradford-based experimental electro-acoustic musicians, Alice Gilmour and shi Blank (listen here).

i play behs for Echo Machine One.

i play drums for Queer of Hearts.

i do sound design for Edible Archives.

other things

i make zines and help out at the Bradford Zine Fair.

Play Music Project is a collective of many sound projects and events.

weirdspace is a zine and podcast showcasing women and non-binary composers/musicians.

You may see some of my stuff online or in unexpected (?) corners on the streets of Bratfud.

old:
i'm always looking out for ways people are using d-portal. Reports from data analysis usually include comments on user interface and methods to extract the needed data from the site. This is where the most valuable feedback comes from and by going through the processes, we are able to learn where things are lacking. This, in turn, allows us to better the platform further. ~ shi

1.	[Agroecology Papers](./agro)
2.	[Data experiments](./dex)
3.	[Dquery](./dquery)

i also write zines, riso and do some manner of type, poster and graphic design, all of which are a lot of fun and totally different to the usual stuff i do. You can purchase my zines below.

4.	[weirdspace](https://notshi.github.io/weird/)
5.	[zines-in-progress](./zine)

when no one's watching, i do things with other people.

6. [Play Music Project](https://notshi.github.io/pmp/)
